com.ibm.team.workitem.client
Interface WorkItemWorkingCopy

All Superinterfaces:
org.eclipse.core.runtime.IAdaptable
public interface WorkItemWorkingCopy
extends org.eclipse.core.runtime.IAdaptable

A work item's working copy is used to change a work item. Working copies are shared in the system and must be connected to and disconnected from explicitly (See IWorkItemWorkingCopyManager). See WorkItemOperation which implements connect and disconnect calls for convenience.

A workflow action can be set that will trigger a state transition when the work item is saved on the server (See WorkItemWorkingCopy.setWorkflowAction(String) and IWorkflowInfo.getActionIds(com.ibm.team.workitem.common.model.Identifier)).

Since:
0.5
See Also:
IWorkItem, IWorkItemReferences, WorkItemOperation, IWorkItemWorkingCopyManager
